name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Matthew S. MOTLEY, Appellee

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:.
Order affirmed.
NIX and LARSEN, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:.

casebody.head_matter:
401 A.2d 365
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Matthew S. MOTLEY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 26, 1979.
Decided May 21, 1979.
Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty.-Law, Marrianne E. Cox, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Marilyn J. Gelb, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
